BlocklancerToken.TimeLeftBeforeCrowdsale (/unique_chucks/2/0x63e634330a20150dbb61b15648bc73855d6ccf07.sol#152-160) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:

BlocklancerToken.ICOopen (/unique_chucks/2/0x63e634330a20150dbb61b15648bc73855d6ccf07.sol#256-261) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp < fundingStart (/unique_chucks/2/0x63e634330a20150dbb61b15648bc73855d6ccf07.sol#260-261)

BlocklancerToken.fallback (/unique_chucks/2/0x63e634330a20150dbb61b15648bc73855d6ccf07.sol#263-290) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
